Madonna suffers meltdown

Pop star Madonna was seen swigging tequila from a fan’s hip flask and asked the crowd to “please take care of me” as she took to the stage in Melbourne for a show.

The 57-year-old singer, who is locked in a bitter custody dispute with ex-husband Guy Ritchie over their son Rocco, couldn’t contain her emotions while she performed at the Rod Laver Arena. She even made an emotional plea to the crowd, begging: “Somebody take care of me please. Who is going to take care of me?” She even fell off a tricycle, and told her fans she had “messed up’ her songs, according to The Sun. — IANS
title: Madonna suffers onstage meltdown in Melbourne
